titles.title: A bill to prevent the Federal Aviation Administration's Aircraft Registry Office from closing during a Government shutdown.
A bill to prevent the Federal Aviation Administration's Aircraft Registry Office from closing during a Government shutdown.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

bill.summary: This bill directs the Federal Aviation Administration (FAA) to designate employees at the FAA Aircraft Registry Office in Oklahoma City, Oklahoma, as excepted employees in the event of a government shutdown or emergency furlough to ensure that it remains open for the duration of the lapse in federal government appropriations to the FAA.
